title: Which is the best app for making pen pals? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of apps out there in the market for making new friends. But here I include the Best three apps which will help you make new pen friends, and this requires a lot of patience.  1. Bottled: I like the concept and interface of the app. You can share through letters, frequency of note depends upon the distance between you and your pen pal. Bottled - Android ‎Bottled - iOS 2. Lettrs: This app lets you write your letters in a very unique and attractive style. You can scribble on letters if you are bored with traditional alphabets. Explore autographed letters from your favorite celebrities. ‎lettrs - iOS 3. Slowly: You can make friends according to your interests or hobbies. If you want, you can also easily filter out the people from a specific region. SLOWLY - Android ‎SLOWLY - iOS You can check out the complete list of Best pen pal apps for Android and iOS devices from the link below. 15 Best Pen Pal Apps for Android and iOS Sorry for my bad English.
